content: The best part is she's really got ballz. Watching the "youtube" video (long version), it's obvious she knows how the audience is LOOKING at her and perceiving her ... and her composure and confidence in her own abilities are simply stunning - never mind the fact that her voice could stop a Broadway show in its tracks. I wish I had half that confidence in day-to-day activities, and I consider myself a pretty confident and capable person. But she's something to behold. Glorious voice, superb self-confidence. Go Susan Boyle! I'd buy/download a CD in a heartbeat!!
reply: The best part is she's really got ballz. Go Susan Boyle! I'd buy/download a CD in a heartbeat!!
